short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: lil tool that makes everything downcase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension converts all the text on a website into lowercase for easy readability and fun. Users can always exclude websites they don't want the extension to run on.
